_comment: Static quote collection for daily inspiration. Open for contributions - feel free to add more motivational quotes relevant to students, learning, and achievement!

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
quotes.author: B.B. King

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.text: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.text: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.text: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.text: Intelligence plus character—that is the goal of true education.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.text: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: What we learn with pleasure we never forget.
quotes.author: Alfred Mercier

quotes.text: Change is the end result of all true learning.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: Strive for progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.text: It's not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.text: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds grow through use.
quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

quotes.text: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Learning never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: In learning you will teach, and in teaching you will learn.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.text: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Ben Francia

quotes.text: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
quotes.author: Walter Elliot

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Isabel Marant

quotes.text: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.text: Education breeds confidence. Confidence breeds hope. Hope breeds peace.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Study while others are sleeping; work while others are loafing; prepare while others are playing.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: The expert in anything was once a beginner who refused to give up.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.text: You don't need to be perfect to be amazing.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.text: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Today's accomplishments were yesterday's impossibilities.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Matty Mullins

quotes.text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.text: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: One child, one teacher, one book, one pen can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.text: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.text: Self-education is, I firmly believe, the only kind of education there is.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing.
quotes.author: Pelé

quotes.text: If you are not willing to learn, no one can help you. If you are determined to learn, no one can stop you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
